name: water-monitoring-info
label: Water Distribution Info from Water Monitoring Nodes in IIIT Hyderabad campus
description: Real-time information/measurements obtained from distribution monitoring systems installed in IIIT Hyderabad campus.

dataDescriptor.description: Data Descriptor for data from water monitoring systems in IIIT Hyderabad.

deviceID.description: Device ID corresponding to this observation.

deviceName.description: Name of the device corresponding to this observation.

location.description: The physical coordinates of the device corresponding to this observation.

waterLevel.description: The instantaneous Water Level from the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

pH.description: The instantaneous value of pH from the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

turbidity.description: The instantaneous value of turbidity from the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

waterPressure.description: The instantaneous value of water pressure from the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

waterFlow.description: The instantaneous value of water flow from the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

flowRate.description: The instantaneous value of flow rate from the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

waterTemperature.description: The instantaneous value of temperature from the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

compensatedTDS.description: The instantaneous value of TDS with temperature compensation using the equation: 133.42*CVÂ³-255.86*CVÂ²+857.39*CV*0.5

uncompensatedTDS.description: The instantaneous TDS value without temperature compensation

name: solar-panel-info
label: Realtime info from Solar panels in IIIT Hyderabad campus
description: Real-time information/measurements obtained from the solar panels mounted in IIIT Hyderabad campus.

dataDescriptor.description: Data Descriptor for data from solar energy monitors in IIIT Hyderabad.

deviceID.description: Device ID corresponding to this observation.

deviceName.description: Name of the device corresponding to this observation.

location.description: The physical coordinates of the device corresponding to this observation.

energyGenerated.description: The value of solar energy generated on the current day from the solar panel corresponding to this observation.

totalEnergyGenerated.description: The total solar energy generated so far from the solar panel corresponding to this observation.

frequency.description: The instantaneous value of Frequency from the solar panel corresponding to this observation.

powerFactor.description: The instantaneous value of Power Factor from the solar panel corresponding to this observation.

totalActivePower.description: The instantaneous value of signed Active Power from the solar panel corresponding to this observation.

voltage.description: The value of Voltage in the entity corresponding to this observation.

totalReactivePower.description: Total reactive power for all phases

totalApparentPower.description: Total apparent power consumed by all the phases

tee.description: Total Energy Export, It is the total energy consumed by the load connected to the device corresponding to this observation.

tei.description: Total Energy Imported, it is the total energy received by the device corresponding to this observation.

location.description: The physical coordinates of the device corresponding to this observation.

rssi.description: The value of rssi of data packet received from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

phaseCurrent.description: Ordered triple comprising the instantaneous value of current per phase in the following order [R Y B], from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

phaseVoltage.description: Ordered triple comprising the instantaneous value of voltage per phase in the following order [R Y B], from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

powerFactor.description: The instantaneous value of Power Factor from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

frequency.description: The instantaneous value of Frequency from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

totalApparentPower.description: The instantaneous value of apparent power from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

totalActivePower.description: The instantaneous value of Real Power from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

energyConsumed.description: The instantaneous value of Energy Consumption from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

reactiveEnergyLead.description: The instantaneous value of Reactive Energy Lead from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

reactiveEnergyLag.description: The instantaneous value of Reactive Energy Lag from the Energy-Monitoring node corresponding to this observation.

name: indoor-air-quality-info
label: Indoor Air Quality Monitoring Devices in IIIT Hyderabad Campus
description: Indoor Air quality monitoring device in International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad.

dataDescriptor.dataDescriptorLabel: Indoor AQM sensors in IIIT Hyderabad
dataDescriptor.description: Data Descriptor for data from indoor AQM sensors in IIIT Hyderabad.

deviceID.description: Device ID of the indoor air-quality sensor corresponding to this observation.

deviceName.description: Name of the indoor air quality sensor corresponding to this observation.

location.description: The physical coordinates of the device corresponding to this observation.

pm2p5.description: Instantaneous or aggregated values for particulate matter 2.5(PM2.5). For PM2.5 aggregation, the aggregation duration is specified using the durationInMinutes field.

pm10.description: Instantaneous or aggregated values for particulate matter 10(PM10). For PM10 aggregation, the aggregation duration is specified using the durationInMinutes field.

airTemperature.description: Instantaneous or aggregated values for air temperature. For airTemperature aggregation, the aggregation duration is specified using the durationInMinutes field.

relativeHumidity.description: Instantaneous or aggregated values for relative humidity (water vapour in air). For relativeHumidity aggregation, the aggregation duration is specified using the durationInMinutes field.

co2.description: Instantaneous or aggregated values for carbon monoxide(CO). For CO aggregation, the aggregation duration is specified using the durationInMinutes field.

vocTotal.description: Instantaneous or aggregated values for Volatile Organic Compounds, the aggregation duration is specified using the durationInMinutes field.

vocRaw.description: Instantaneous or aggregated values for raw Volatile Organic Compounds, the aggregation duration is specified using the durationInMinutes field.

dataSample.deviceName: Indoor Air Quality node 3 at Ground Floor of Kohli Research Block
